summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account during July 2018. It includes outgoing money transfers to individuals named Peter Rawson and Charles Pickett, as well as service charges and other fees associated with the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, detailing his account balances and transactions.

persons.name: Peter Rawson
persons.context: Peter Rawson is mentioned as a recipient of an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Charles Pickett
persons.context: Charles Pickett is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein transferred funds to Peter Rawson's account.
Jeffrey Epstein transferred funds to Charles Pickett's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to Peter Rawson
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $221.64 was made from Epstein's account to Peter Rawson's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to Charles Pickett
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $17,302.76 was made from Epstein's account to Charles Pickett's account.

events.title: Final Account Balance
events.description: The ending balance of Epstein's account as of July 31, 2018, was $326,685.34.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Jeffrey Epstein's account.
The account had a balance of $326,685.34 as of July 31, 2018.
There were outgoing money transfers to Peter Rawson and Charles Pickett during July 2018.
Service charges and fees were also detailed in the statement.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
